code: import axios from'axios';import cheerio from'cheerio';const fetchPitchforkArticles=async()=>{const url="https://pitchfork.com/news/";try{const response=await axios.get(url);const $=cheerio.load(response.data);const articles=$('.module.latest-module.collection-module.news-module.latest-module--horizontal').slice(0,3).map((index,element)=>{const title=$(element).find('h2').text();const image=$(element).find('img').attr('src');const articleUrl=$(element).find('a').attr('href');return{title,image,articleUrl};}).get();return articles;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching articles:',error);return[];}};export default fetchPitchforkArticles;
